title: 【留台就業指南:楊冠義 ISAAC YONG 主講  TAIWAN EMPLOYMENT GUIDE WITH ISAAC YONG AS GUEST SPEAKER】
author: 鄭海樂
content:
分類： 活動公告, 演講暨研討會
來源： 國際事務處 - 鄭海樂 - hesp@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話5173
對象： 全校學生
標題： 【留台就業指南:楊冠義 ISAAC YONG 主講  TAIWAN EMPLOYMENT GUIDE WITH ISAAC YONG AS GUEST SPEAKER】
日期： Mon, 18 Mar 2024 15:18:19 +0800
附檔： 2.png (1 MB)   3.png (1 MB)   
【東華國際處 X 東華諮臨系 】

留台就業指南:楊冠義 ISAAC YONG 主講
 TAIWAN EMPLOYMENT GUIDE WITH ISAAC YONG AS GUEST SPEAKER

繼去年成功辦理了「台灣就業指南」講座並廣受同學們的熱烈反響，我們很榮幸地宣布今年將再次舉辦此講座，並邀請到迦南計畫創辦人楊冠義先生擔任我們的主講嘉賓。為了更好地滿足我們同學的需求，今年的講座將於3月28日和29日分別辦理中文場以及英文場。
楊冠義先生不僅是一位傑出的企業家，還是一位對台灣深具熱情的大使。他成功創辦了Malaysians In Taiwan，不僅為台灣的馬來西亞社群提供了一個溫馨的家，也為您提供在台灣尋找職業機會的指南。機會難得，歡迎您攜朋帶友，一同探索如何在台灣實現職業夢想。
活動地點：行政大樓416會議室
活動日期：2024.3.28（四）中文場，2024.3.29（五）英文場
活動時間：1200-1400
截止日期：2024.3.22（五）
報名連結：https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScBLClFk3Iad0220t67Je0XjK7c4McKU3iUu2y4mGG8vcJlAQ/viewform?usp=pp_url

【NDHU OIA X NDHU CCP】

Following the successful organisation of the seminar “TAIWAN EMPLOYMENT GUIDE “last year and upon the requests of students, we are proud to announce that we will be organising another seminar this year again with the founder of The Canaan Project, Mr. Isaac Yong as our honoured guest speaker. In order to better cater to the needs of our students, the seminar this year will be in Mandarin and English on the 28th and 29th of March respectively.
Mr. Isaac Yong is not only an outstanding entrepreneur but also a passionate ambassador for Taiwan. He has successfully established “Malaysians in Taiwan”, providing a warm home for the Malaysian community in Taiwan and offering guidance on finding career opportunities in Taiwan. This is a rare opportunity, and we welcome you to bring your friends and join us to explore the paths of how to land your dream jobs in Taiwan.
Event Venue: Conference Room 416, Administration Building
Event Date: 28th March 2024 (Thu) Seminar conducted in Mandarin, 29th March 2024 (Fri) Seminar conducted in English
Event Time: 1200-1400
Deadline: 22th March 2024(Fri)
Registration Link:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScBLClFk3Iad0220t67Je0XjK7c4McKU3iUu2y4mGG8vcJlAQ/viewform?usp=pp_url
